title: MNF Preview: Chargers vs. Saints Gambling Picks, Props & DFS Advice (Football 10/12)
description:
It seemed as though we'd have back-to-back weeks with a double dose of Monday Night Football. That turned out to not be the case as Broncos-Patriots was pushed back again, but we still have Chargers-Saints slated as the true Week 5 MNF game. On this episode, Will Brinson is joined by Tyler Sullivan to break down the game from a gambling perspective. Michael Thomas was set to return and then he decided to punch a teammate in the face, so New Orleans will be without a top weapon. What does that mean for Alvin Kamara related props? Brinson believes Drew Brees despises the Chargers, but will that hatred convert to the playing field for the aging QB? Listen for the picks, props and DFS advice you need if you want more action after the weekend.
Follow the Pick Six team on Twitter: @picksixpod, @willbrinson, @TylerSully
Visit the Pick Six YouTube channel: https://www.youtube.com/picksix
Check out the Pick Six Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/picksixpod/?hl=en
